column1: Little Goat Diner////After a pre-employment medical screening downtown
column2: I decided that it was time to try a new place. While not too familiar with the area where my physical was being held
column3: I found out the facility was just a short walk from Ogilvie Transportation Center. That being said
column4: I searched Yelp for some Breakfast/Lunch type fare
column5: and Little Goat piqued my interest.
